name: The Initial
description: THE INITIAL is a hyper action game about pretty schoolgirls battling against evil. It's developed by a small team of five developers. We hope you will love this game as much as we do.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel i3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 740 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel i5 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
